info.name: PRYMO Match Type API
info.description: Complete API collection for BJJ and Boxing match type logging

formdata.value: Need to work on arm defense

formdata.description: Optional - '5 min', '6 min', '7 min', '8 min', '10 min', 'Other'
Optional - Tagged opponent ObjectId (creates mirrored entry)
Conditional - Required if boxingVictoryMethod='KO' or 'TKO' (format: M:SS)
Required - Opponent name or use tagFriend
Optional - Gym name (auto-filled if tagFriend used)
Required - '1 min', '2 min', '3 min', '4 min', '5 min', 'Other'
OPTIONAL - Tag gym member (creates mirrored entry for Roll/Sparring)
OPTIONAL - Video file upload (30 sec max)

BJJ - If methodOfVictory='Submission': Armbar, Triangle Choke, Rear Naked Choke, Guillotine, Kimura, Americana, Ankle Lock, Kneebar, Wrist Lock, Toe Hold, Bow and Arrow Choke, North-South Choke, Ezekiel Choke, Calf Slicer, Other
BJJ - Your score if methodOfVictory='Points' or 'Advantage' (0-50)
BJJ - Opponent score if methodOfVictory='Points' or 'Advantage' (0-50)
BJJ Competition - '5 min', '6 min', '7 min', '8 min', '10 min', 'Other'
BJJ Competition - Custom minutes if matchDuration='Other'
BJJ Roll/Sparring - '3 min', '5 min', '6 min', '8 min', 'Other'
BJJ Roll/Sparring - Custom minutes if rollDuration='Other'
BJJ - Rooster (<57.5kg), Light Feather (<64kg), Feather (<70kg), Light (<76kg), Middle (<82.3kg), Medium-Heavy (<88.3kg), Heavy (<94.3kg), Super Heavy (<100.5kg), Ultra Heavy (>100.5kg)
BOXING Competition - Rounds fought if Points Decision (1-12)
BOXING - Round of stoppage if KO/TKO (1-12)
BOXING - Stoppage time if KO/TKO (format: M:SS, e.g., 2:59)

BOXING - Minimumweight, Light Flyweight, Flyweight, Super Flyweight, Bantamweight, Super Bantamweight, Featherweight, Super Featherweight, Lightweight, Super Lightweight, Welterweight, Super Welterweight, Middleweight, Super Middleweight, Light Heavyweight, Cruiserweight, Heavyweight, Super Heavyweight
BOXING Sparring - '1 min', '2 min', '3 min', '4 min', '5 min', 'Other'
BOXING Sparring - Custom minutes if timePerRound='Other'
BOXING Sparring - Gym name (auto-filled if tagFriend used)
COMMON - Request peer feedback (auto-ON if teammate tagged)
